results.subtitle: Shown in Walnut + Clear Finish + Raw Steel
results.short_description: The retro styled Hayes Console™ will do your living room justice by hiding that DVD player you still have.
results.product_copy: The Hayes Console™ is built with quality wood veneer. Its design is simple, leaving the wood grain to speak for itself. Included soft-close cabinet hinges and drawer slide hardware give a sense of sophisticated action. The body is elevated on minimal round steel legs that add to its retro styling. Please select your Wood Species, Wood Finish, and Base Color when ordering.
results.options_text: Please Choose an Option
results.blockquote_text: Its design is simple, leaving the wood grain to speak for itself. Included soft-close cabinet hinges and drawer slide hardware give a sense of sophisticated action.

results.subtitle: Shown in Reclaimed Oak + DW Stain
results.short_description: Rustic wood milled to perfectly resemble a solid stack of beams.
results.product_headline: What a railroad tie aspires to be.
results.product_copy: The Beam Table™ is a clever use of reclaimed oak that has been hand cut and milled to appear as a solid stack of railroad ties. The inside is hollow making the piece manageable to transport yet retains the eye catching heft of solid beams. The table looks great in a magnitude of stain colors and can be ordered in custom sizes. Please pick your Stain Color and state if needing a custom size when ordering.

results.product_copy: The Bowery Light™ has a long history at Project Sunday. Atop our handcrafted wooden base is a vintage studio lamp which is unique to the piece. We have 'Found' most of these lights, cleaned them up, and installed modern wiring kits for any 120V outlet. Keep an eye out on the Bowery page for current inventory. Light bulbs sold separately. Please select the Wood Species and Wood Finish for the base when ordering.

results.subtitle: Shown in Standard Queen and Upgraded King
results.product_copy: The Stack Bed™ is our flagship piece. This piece is all your essential bedroom furniture built into one. The design is customizable with available night stands, drawers, and lights giving you the freedom to suit your style. We built the headboard to offer plenty of space to shelve items and the footboard is standard seat height to be used as a bench. The Stack Bed™ can be disassembled without tools into four pieces for easy transportation. Please choose your Wood Species, Wood Finish, Steel Color, and Size upon ordering. Within your email make a note of which headboard design you would like. Shown below is a Standard Queen and an Upgraded King. *Note* This bed is designed to be used without a box spring.

results.subtitle: Shown in Makore + Clear Finish
results.short_description: Console table with open storage and a solid wood drawer.
results.product_copy: The Makoré Console™ name is unique to the original prototype from which it was made. Using leftover makoré from the first LDS temple in Rome, we played around with some compound joinery to get what you see here. It's been designed to highlight line, shape, and form. The asymmetric layout makes for a unique piece that will never go out of style. We no longer use Makoré due to the hazardous dust when working with the wood, but it is still available in solid hardwoods. This console is sure to endure your lifestyle until the next generation calls it vintage. Please choose your Wood Species and Wood Finish when ordering.
results.options_text: Please specify on inquiry if you prefer any of the options stated.
results.blockquote_text:
Featured in the 2016 DesignArts Utah Exhibition. 
The asymmetric layout makes for a unique piece that will never go out of style. We no longer use Makoré due to the hazardous dust when working with the wood, but it is still available in solid hardwoods.

results.product_headline: A drawer for this and a drawer for that.
results.product_copy: The Ashbury Table™ is an early Project Sunday piece. This coffee table, like our Stack Table™, realizes that people create clutter. Some of that clutter isn't clutter at all and needs to be used frequently and kept at an arms reach. The 45 degree slanted top mated to a 1x1" steel frame is as modern and industrial as you want to get. Please choose your Wood Species, Wood Finish, and Base Color when ordering.

results.product_copy: The Coney Kitchen Island™ is designed with small living and space consciousness in mind. Several thousand square foot dwellings are impressive, but when you can squeeze butcher block tops, pot and pan storage, a paper towel holder and open shelving all on wheels it just feels like a step in the right direction. Please select your Wood Species, Wood Finish, and Steel Color when ordering. Marble and granite countertops available upon request.

results.short_description: Once a barn or bridge or hovel, now a comfortable platform bed.
results.product_copy: The Trestle Bed™ is as it seems, low to the ground, wide protection on all sides, naturally aged wood. This bed frame is a treat to sleep in and creates a beautiful statement in any bedroom. The wide perimeter makes you truly feel as if you are IN bed. The Trestle can be disassembled without tools into four pieces for easy transportation. Please choose your Wood Finish and Bed Size below. *Note* This bed is designed to be used without a boxspring.

results.product_headline: Backless. Not for the faint of heart.
results.product_copy: The Harlem Stool™ was created as a spin off of the Manhattan. Not to create any tension between the neighboring cities, these stools are both very good looking. The Harlem sports a wooden top without any back which emphasizes the wood grains. Similar construction with adjustable feet make this another very nice option for a bar or kitchen. Please choose your desired Height, Wood Species, Wood Finish, and Base Color when ordering.

results.subtitle: Shown in Walnut + Natural Linseed Oil + Tinted Glass
results.product_copy: The Rockwell™ is an antiqued, weather beaten beauty. When designing this piece we knew that it needed to look like it had come from the past. The wood finish must be soft  and natural, not manmade. The hardware needed a touch of rust yet still function well. We use tinted glass in the doors so that you can be sure that your guests know exactly what kind of punch you're packing. Please choose your Wood Species and Wood Finish when ordering.

results.short_description: Visible craftsmanship in a small, elegant package.
results.product_copy: The Dado Table™ is a simple design using essential woodworking techniques to fasten its legs together. The base is made from solid hardwood that is cut to size, then "dado" jointed at each intersection. We figured the craftsmanship should be showcased, so a 36" round piece of glass rests on top. A beautiful design for the center of any room. The Dado Table™ comes in one size only. Please choose your Wood Species and Wood Finish when ordering.

results.short_description: Residential wet bar with all the bells and whistles.
results.product_copy: The Essex Liquor Cabinet™ is what we think a home wet bar should be. A quality built piece with all the details carefully planned out. There is space to store your glassware, your mixology equipment, plenty of cabinet space for bottles of various liquors and ingredients, a solid countertop (available in wood, stone, or concrete), plus accent lighting. This piece will surely add some sophistication to your space. Please inquire with desired dimensions, counter material, and glass color. The Essex can be custom built to your specifications. Allow processing time to receive a price when customizing dimensions and stone color. Locals Only.

results.subtitle: Shown in DW Stain (Sold)
results.product_copy: The Trestle Table is a product of decay. Nothing lasts forever in its current form. We discovered how satisfying it is to reuse building materials and vintage parts when designing this piece. The wood was salvaged from an old collapsed bridge and the brass light was once an early 1900s scale. Due to the unique nature of the materials used the Trestle Table, no two are the same and each has it's own story. Make sure to keep checking back in on this page for availability.

results.blockquote_text: The wood was salvaged from an old collapsed bridge and the brass light was once an early 1900s scale.

results.short_description: Box designed coffee table with clever storage cubbies.
results.product_copy: The Stack Table™ has a niche all to its own. Belonging to the Project Sunday Stack Line, it occupies the essential role of coffee table. When designing furniture, we like to think about how to take a common piece people use everyday and add a feature or two. With this one, we added discrete storage cubbies to help tidy up your primary sitting area. One inch stacked wood gives the piece a lot of grain character and a different presence which will add to any space. Please select your Wood Species, Wood Finish, and Metal Color when ordering.

results.subtitle: Shown in Reclaimed Oak + Clear Finish + Patina Steel
results.short_description: Wood storage console suspended in steel.
results.product_copy: The Stack Console™ is part of our stack line. Built out of a plywood core with 1" reclaimed oak texture wood, this console is matched with an interesting steel base which suspends the body. We designed the top drawer to be large for common electronics such as DVRs and other players. Thoughtfulness transpired into the expanded steel face for remote connectivity. Below, the cabinets include smoked glass to add a bit of refinement to the wood and steel with an adjustable shelf inside. The Stack Console™ comes in one size only. Please select your Wood Species, Wood Finish, and Base Color when ordering.

results.subtitle: Shown in Alder + DW Stain
results.product_copy: Presented with tight, challenging, boring walls in a lot of homes, we decided that there needed to be a well designed piece that could make the space useable. The Sterling Shelves™ became just that. Built as a three sided wooden "skin" which slides over a substructure for easy installation. Please choose your Wood Species and Wood Finish when order. Sterling Shelving™ orders require specific wall measurements to allow a product designer to work with you to help produce a layout.
results.options_text: Please specify on inquiry if you prefer any of the options stated.
results.blockquote_text: Sterling Shelves™ with access to walls on three sides can support substantially more weight than when mounting to one or two.
results.dimensions_copy: Please measure your wall lengths and specify if the desired location has one, two, or three walls to attach shelving to.

results.subtitle: Shown in Alder + DW Stain
results.product_copy: The Hamilton Bed™ is a solid wood constructed bed frame built low on a box footboard and two pieces of thick steel to support the head. A key feature of this bed are the massive, single plank siderails measuring 9" wide and 2" thick of your selected hardwood. The combined effort of the side rails and wooden slats allow for a natural flex which adds to your sleeping comfort. The Hamilton has been designed to be easily disassembled using simple tools (sold separately). *Note* This bed frame is designed to be used without a box spring.

results.short_description: Custom Marquee lights available in select fonts, sizes, and sayings.

results.subtitle: Shown in Reclaimed Oak + White Oak + DW Stain Base (Sold)
results.short_description: Asymmetric and chaotic as life can be.
results.product_headline: Retail is more than just the goods.
results.product_copy: The Hurricane Display Table™ was designed to be chaotic. Its base looks as though the pieces are debris being thrown around in a storm. The top is reclaimed wood found alongside a local industry building. Where this particular storm ended was a local men's clothing boutique. Adding unique furnishing to a retail space is just as important as the items being sold. The Hurricane is always changing and available upon request. No two are alike.

results.short_description: A clean, delicate, geometric table available in custom sizes.
results.product_copy: The Arlington™ is available with either a straight wood top or a slanted 45 degree wood top that's secured to the minimal steel frame. It's a clean look that can be used as a coffee table, side table, accent table, behind couch table, dining table, entryway table...you get the point. It's available in custom sizes and looks good anywhere. Please choose your Wood Species, Wood Finish, Surface Design (straight or angled), Base Color and Desired Size upon ordering.

results.product_copy: The Bedrock™ is an unique asset to any home or business. The beams we use to make this bench are solid oak or pine. Once used by mankind, nature has had her way with the wood. Each Bedrock™ has different grain, colors, and sizes. The two prop leg design makes for a very organic piece of furniture. Please inquire info@projectsunday.net for availability.
results.options_text: Please specify on inquiry if you prefer any of the options stated.
results.dimensions_copy: The Bedrock™ is not an inventory based item and must be inquired for availability and sizes.

results.subtitle: Shown in Sapele + Clear Finish
results.product_copy: The Family Jewel™ coffee table is a simple design that incorporates subtle woodworking techniques to create fine lines. We decided to make it slightly oversized for larger spaces. The tapered legs and routed edges give it a resemblance to unearthed mineral gems. Please choose your Wood Species and Wood Finish when ordering.

results.dimensions_copy: The Family Jewel™ comes in one size only. *Note* Wood Grain may vary from piece to piece.
